long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Huddle01 is a P2P de-centralized video conferencing platform built on blockchain technology. Currently people attending the meeting doesn't have an easier way to take notes. They either depend on physical notes or switching between tabs to take notes. This extension gives a native note taking experience for huddle users.

- One click note taking experience
- Easy and simple markdown editor
- Notion like snippets to take notes
- Auto save notes
- Auto populate notes on reconnecting to the meeting
-  Simple dashboard to look into all the notes taken.
